page.title: 02CATERHAM VALLEY
page.content:
Caterham Valley is situated on the northern slopes of the {NORTH DOWNS.} It is a terminus for a branch line of British Rail, which was a spur to the development of the area. It is used for commuting to Croydon and London by many people.
The valley is a shopping centre with a wide variety of shops. The main food shop is {WAITROSE,}there are many others. My favourite shop is{DITTO,}it sells posters, stationery, rubbers and lots of other nice things.
The valley also has the local police station.
